If everyone ate less animal foods, the CO2 from food production would drop by 68%. Just by changing our food choices, we could be halfway to stopping climate change.

I mean, climate change will mostly affect us young people because we will see its outcomes in our lifetime. And you can also find out which foods are especially harmful for the climate (hint: the farm animal that is worst for the climate rhymes with â€˜wowâ€™).
